content:
I have a field for the number of sessions of Cognitive Behavioural Therapy performed on a patient in the past.
Eg: Number of sessions performed = 8

I understand that Cognitive Behavioural Therapy maps to procedure.

I am unable to find where to include the "number of sessions" inside the procedure.
I do not have the date time of the sessions performed, so I cannot include this in performed-dateTime field.

Please help me figure this out.
That sounds like an appropriate change request. Would you be able to submit one? For now, you may need to use an extension
@Lloyd McKenzie I will do that. Thank You very much.
